channel.title: Any good coders can you help me please ? thankyou!
channel.description: well i am making my own mini game and i am goin to add objects that are crates into my chosen area, im giong to have 30 ov them and 10 ov which hold keys, how can make 10 of them carry keys ? and the other 20 have nothing inside, and when i click on the empty crates it says sorry nothing inside, and when i click on crates that carry keys it gives the player the key and puts in inven and says weldone you have key! also what folder would i put this in? please someone help me thankyou! much appreciated
